page.title: 17SUDELEY- GHOSTS,STAFF,FARMS
page.content:
{**Ghosts-}There is supposed to be the ghost of a housekeeper that sits by the fireplace in the restaurant. No of the present Staff have seen her however. A ghost is also supposed to walk along at the top of the stairs.
{**Staff-}Sudeley employs 4 gardeners, 4 office staff, 1 manager, 1 paybox clerk,10 guides, 4 cleaners, 1 wages clerk,1 florist, 6 restaurant staff and one maintenance man,1 Falconer Some of the Staff live in cottages near to the Castle. (33 altogether){ { {**Farms-}There are four farms associated with Sudeley Castle, they are about 500 acres each. (7)
